Text:
thanks!
Can u find & upload any of these movies:
1. Paperback Hero (1999).
2. Flirting with Disaster (1996)
3. The Walker (2007)

I just checked and from what I can tell, the only one of those that's been released in high resolution (720p or 1080p) is The Walker, and I may have a hard time getting it, but I promise I will try for you. I don't know if you've looked at my list of uploaded torrents or not, but I usually only do high resolution encodes. 

I'm also planning on doing The Usual Suspects 1080p, Pi 1080p and The Sunset Limited 1080p first, but I will absolutely try to get The Walker for you.

Wow..thanks for the quick response!
Yes, I have been a regular follower of all your torrents and really appreciate the quality of ur releases. 
Also, one thing that really differentiates you is the fact that you respond quickly to all the requests.
I saw that you generally do releases that are not done by Yify and so selected these movies.
Thanks for The Walker(in advance) :)
Better than YIFY and way better than anoXmous! Keep up the good work!
